name: Score Type:
description: Choose the way the score is showcased.

name: Detailed Score:
description: Shows additional information (such as sicks, goods, etc).

name: Score Background:
description: Give the score, including detailed score, a semi-transparent background.

name: Strumline Background:
description: Give the strumline a semi-transparent background.

name: Stylization
description: If checked, enables stylization (font/sprite changes) of default HUD elements. Uncheck only if experience visual bugs in certain songs.
